tool_description: Validates visual content against brand guidelines including color usage, logo placement, font consistency, and style requirements for brand compliance.

content_url.description: URL or path to the visual content to check

brand_colors.description: Array of approved brand hex color codes

brand_fonts.description: Array of approved brand font names

approved_logo_url.description: URL to approved logo for comparison

style_guidelines.description: Style rules: professional, casual, minimal, bold, elegant

error_messages: Content not accessible: Ensure content_url points to a valid image or video file.
Invalid brand colors: Provide valid hex color codes starting with # in brand_colors array.
Invalid brand fonts: Provide valid font names in brand_fonts array.
Logo not accessible: Ensure approved_logo_url points to a valid logo image file.
Invalid style guidelines: Use values from [professional, casual, minimal, bold, elegant].
usage: Provide content_url along with brand_colors and brand_fonts arrays. Optionally specify logo requirements and style guidelines for comprehensive brand compliance checking.

violations.description: Array of specific compliance violations found

recommendations.description: Array of specific recommendations to achieve compliance
